description: getTimestamp() function exists and is exported from src/utils/timestamp.js
steps: Step 1: Verify file exists at src/utils/timestamp.js
Step 2: Run node -e to check getTimestamp is a function
Step 3: Verify function can be imported and called without errors

description: getTimestamp() returns current date/time in ISO 8601 format
steps: Step 1: Call getTimestamp() and capture output
Step 2: Verify output matches ISO 8601 pattern (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ)
Step 3: Verify timestamp is current (within last minute)

description: Test file verifies timestamp utility functionality
steps: Step 1: Verify test file exists at src/utils/timestamp.test.js
Step 2: Run test file with node
Step 3: Verify test passes with exit code 0
